DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-interventional time motion study evaluate cost healthcare resource utilization associate administration trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) SC IV formulation HER2-positive EBC . This sub-study clinical study MO22982 ( NCT01401166/PrefHer ) .
